Text.Page:
Take part in the World Dungeon Challenge!
Enter the special [Challenge] Antaroth's Abyss (Resonance) dungeon and compete against players from around the globe!

If you have the requisite ticket or potion, then pay a visit to Dundunuk.

Data Protection Information

If you have a Contest Ticket, your group can enter the event dungeon. Master the first stage between 6 AM (UTC) on 13th December 2021 and 2:59 PM (UTC) on 19th December 2021, and you'll participate in the 2021 TERA World Dungeon Challenge.
For the purpose of determining the winners, the following data from all successful participants will be sent to the organizers of the TERA World Dungeon Challenge (Bluehole Studio, Inc., South Korea) every hour during the event:
TERA region (e.g. EU), character name and level, class and party ID, difficulty level, the time needed to complete the dungeon, and the time of completion.
To make sure all the systems are working, there will be a test run between 6 AM (UTC) on 6th December 2021 and 2:59 PM (UTC) on 8th December 2021. The same criteria mentionedabove will apply during this test phase.

More detailed information can be found in our announcement (https://gf.link/teraglobalevent) and the event data protection information (https://gf.link/teraglobaleventtermsEN).
